description.p: ScummVM is an interpreter that will play graphic adventure games written for LucasArts' SCUMM virtual machine (such as Day of the Tentacle and Monkey Island), Sierra's AGI adventures (such as early King's Quest and Space Quest games), Adventure Soft's Simon the Sorcerer 1, 2 and Feeble Files, Revolution Software's Beneath a Steel Sky and Broken Sword 1, 2 and 2.5, Interactive Binary Illusions' Flight of the Amazon Queen, Coktel Vision's Gobliiins, Wyrmkeep's Inherit the Earth, Westwood's Legend of Kyrandia, and various others.
